raw_body: Expired - Loving wife of (late) Henry Oswald, loving daughter of (late) William Lawrence and Gertrude Fernando and daughter-in- law of (late) Harry and Girly Weerasuriya, loving mother and mother-in-law of Sharon, Hiran and Chamindira (Chammi), Lalanthi and Suresh and Priyantha, loving grandma of Pramudh and Nethmi, Thamith, Arnold and Anushika and Kineta, great grand mother of baby Nethara. The remains will lie at ’The Respect Home’ Jayaratne Fu
